name: Hex Fun Mini Cop
description:
Hex Fun Mini Cop, a jigsaw puzzle game. Have a fun time with hexagons!Drag the hexagon into the scene, as long as all the small hexagons combining just full of a straight line, you can eliminate!
How to play:
1. Drag the hexagon to make a line
2. No time limits
3. Create combos to earn high score
